channel.title: sandbox support for VirtualBox
channel.description: I'm on Windows, and I was looking for a way to place VirtualBox in a sandbox as an alternative to physical isolation. I tried SandBoxie but that app failed on VirtualBox. However Shade Sandbox does appear to provide a successful sandbox for VirtualBox. I was just wondering if anyone has any insight on it. Thanks!

item.title: sandbox support for VirtualBox
item.dc:creator: ThatNewDude
item.description:
I did. I really couldn’t find anything. Physical isolation may just be the way to go.

Read full topic

Better to search on the virtualbox website

site:virtualbox.org sandbox

site:virtualbox.org sandboxie

I’m on Windows, and I was looking for a way to place VirtualBox in a sandbox as an alternative to physical isolation. I tried SandBoxie but that app failed on VirtualBox.
